         int collisionType,
         MainWindow mainWindow)
        Constructor to make a new map
        Parameters:
        mapDim - the map's dimensions
        tileDim - a tile's dimensions
        tilesetPath - the path to the tileset file
        collisionType - the map's collision type
        mainWindow - the MainWindow containing the EditorPan
